description: Tempeh replaces chicken in this classic satay stir fry, best served with rice.
name: Tempeh Satay Stir Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large spring onions, sliced, green tips reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together the ingredients for the sauce in a bowl with 23 tablespoons of water to loosen and set aside.

Heat half the oil in the wok on a medium high heat and fry the tempeh cubes on all sides until crisp and golden, about 4 minutes. Add a third of the sauce to the wok and cook for 2 minutes until absorbed by the tempeh. Remove from the wok and set aside.

Using a vegetable peeler, slice the carrot and zucchini lengthways into pappardelle style ribbons. Add the remaining oil and broccoli to the wok and fry for 34 minutes to soften, then stir in the zucchini and carrot ribbons and cook for 2 more minutes.
Add the tempeh back into the wok, then stir in the remaining peanut sauce and cook for 1 more minute, tossing to coat everything well.
Serve in bowls with rice and sliced spring onions and crushed peanuts on top.
